reviewText: My son is a big fan of Adrien Peterson, so we all enjoyed watching this DVD. I thought it would be a little longer, but I didn't check the length before purchasing it. We still liked it.
Awesome video, package was shipped well, and received it earlier than the expected date.  Thanks!
Great watch and a bit of history of A.P.
Bought this for a Vikings fan and he loved it.
I bought this because I am a Vikings fan and love Adrian Peterson. I am very happy with this. A great way to pass the time and enjoy doing it.
This item was purchased as a gift and was filled with great information about AP that a fan will enjoy watching
AD is the most exciting rb to hit the NFL in years. this dvd captures all aspects of his arrival. excellent.

Really enjoyed this DVD, specially after the great season he just had.
Wished he could have broken ED's record!
Can't wait until next season!
What can I say?.......WOW! WHAT A PLAYER!!!!!!! This guy is serious!!!!!!!! I LOVED every minute of this Dvd!!! Adrian is the Man! A MUST for any Viking or NFL fan!!!!!!!

Adrian Peterson is an awesome athlete as we all know. But what many people don't know is that actual training footage is very hard to come by and this DVD encapsulated all aspects of his "coming off age" in the NFL from the day he was drafted to where he broke NFL records against the Philly Eagles.
This DVD is a must for any fan of the game. Trust me, I am a Springbok rugby supporter (As I favor rugby to the NFL)but this DVD even astounded me and converted me.
